![](https://hostup.org/img/logo.svg)

Twitter [@hostup](https://twitter.com/hostup) 

To celebrate our presence here at LET :)

**HostUp's VPS plans are located in the Netherlands and is a perfect solution for both businesses and personal needs. With us you will truly realize what good performance really feels like!**

We utilize SSD storage in RAID 1 to ensure that even if one of our drives fail your data is still backed up. Our memory is also ECC rated, and the uptime is high! ([uptime monitor](https://status.hostup.org/)). Along side this we give you full root & a **dedicated IPv4** IP to your VPS.


**!!!LET SPECIAL!!! LIMITED STOCK**

**15** GB SSD Storage
**1** vCore @2.5 GHz
**1** GB ECC RAM
**1** TB of Bandwidth
Voxility DDOS Protection @ 1 Tbit/s, L1-7

[ORDER NOW](https://hostup.org/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=43) - **$7/yr**

We accept Credit card, PayPal, Bitcoin and bank transfer. We utilize OpenVZ 7 (as for the new features of openvz 7 we support dockers and ubuntu 18.04)
